name: Scraphog
description:
A small shoot-em-up about taking gears from your enemies' ships after you defeat them, and using those gears to power up your arsenal. Made in 2 weeks for my Game Design Workshop class at Fitchburg State.

Controls: arrow keys/WASD to move, Space to shoot.

Assets used in this project are the Spaceship Shooter Environment sprites from Luis Zuno: https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment
